name: errorlens
description: Improve the highlighting of errors, warnings and other language diagnostics.

errorLens.errorColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing errors. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.warningColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing warnings. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.infoColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing info. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.hintColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing hints. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.fontMargin.description: Distance between end of the code line, and the start of the in-line message string.

errorLens.errorMsgPrefix.description: A customizable prefix string, which is added before the in-line message string.
